content:
As discussed in last Sunday’s meeting, we must have all your support to help raise funds to have a successful conference and most importantly to reach our objective of giving back in the form of service. 
There are a few ways you all can help:
1. Please reach out to your friends who you think can align with the principles of NATS and would be interested in service 
2. Friends who would like to have a good time around Memorial Day weekend (food + entertainment + network + many educational/informative/ business seminars)
3. Know of any potential sponsors (corporate or individual) but need help from one of the NATS core members 
4. Businesses that can get benefited by putting up a stall or a booth or would like to participate in information sessions 
5. Businesses that would need brand awareness through our marketing channels 
6. People who just want to get their ads into a souvenir 
7. Finally, we know all of you are putting in time but if you are kind of to donate that would be greatly appreciated as well
